::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod is able to avoid the rockets, but is hit by all optic blasts.
"Aaaaarr!" Hot Rod hit's the ground. He has seveare structual damage.
"Guy's, I could use a hand here!" Hot Rod gets up, jumps behind a rock,
and fires everything he has. (50 plasma charges, 2 rockets, 2 optic
beams.)
